mapper.insert: insert into scfp_chain (chain_no, network_id, bank, fund_id, money, surplus, file_id, deadline, status) values (#{chain_no}, #{network_id}, #{bank}, #{fund_id}, #{money}, #{surplus}, #{file_id}, #{deadline}, #{status})
mapper.delete: update scfp_chain set status=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from scfp_chain order by id desc
